# <a name="has"></a>has

> Collegamento Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call

## <a name="installation"></a>Installazione

```sh
npm install --save has
```

## <a name="usage"></a>Utilizzo

```js
var has = require('has');

has({}, 'hasOwnProperty'); // false
has(Object.prototype, 'hasOwnProperty'); // true
```
